page.title: 16FARMING-TILGATE FOREST FARM
page.content: There are several farms in our area. Most of the farms have grazing land for cows and sheep.Tilgate Forest Lodge Farm hire bulls to mate with heifers.The farmers calve the heifers. When the calf leaves its mother they send the mother to the dairy farm for milking.When the bull has had an injection the farmer puts its favourite heifers in with it.At Tilgate Forest Lodge Farm the number of workable acres on the farm is 340 and there are 250 acres of woodland They own 5 tractors called Massey Fergusons,2 tractors have x35 horse power.1 tractor has x62 horse power and another 2 tractors have x75 horse power.They also use a M.F.combine.Some of the tractors have acid holders on the front.
